about_the_game:
Dive into a dark and atmospheric 2D Metroidvania where the elements themselves become your most potent weapons—and your greatest challenge. Play as Emilius, an alchemist battling to save his kingdom from a devastating plague unleashed by an arcane storm.

Master the elemental powers of fire, water, earth, and air, each offering unique abilities that unlock new paths, solve intricate platforming puzzles, and turn the tide in fierce combat.

Explore a handcrafted, plague-stricken world, where every corner is steeped in mystery and danger. The once-thriving kingdom now lies in decay, its dark dungeons overrun by unnatural storms and plagued creatures, from infested rats to twisted abominations, spreading corruption and disease.

Key Features:

  • Elemental Mastery: Wield the power of the elements to traverse the environment, uncover secrets, and outmaneuver deadly enemies.

  • Atmospheric Exploration: Navigate a richly detailed world of crumbling towers, forgotten dungeons, and eerie forests, brought to life with haunting visuals and a foreboding soundtrack.

  • Challenging Platforming: Test your reflexes and wits with intricate puzzles and skill-based platforming sequences that will push you to your limits.

  • Dynamic Combat: Use your elemental powers strategically to face relentless foes and adapt to their evolving challenges.

Will you master the elements and save your kingdom, or will the storm’s corruption consume you?

Prepare for an unforgettable journey where power comes at a cost!

Traverse a plague-stricken kingdom, face deadly foes, and uncover the truth behind a devastating storm. With handcrafted environments and challenging combat, shape your destiny in a world teetering on the edge of ruin.
